newsitem.title: LITHUANIA: Lithuanian shares ease in moderate trade.
newsitem.headline: Lithuanian shares ease in moderate trade.

text.p: Lithuanian shares eased slightly on Monday although business was fairly quiet, dealers said.
The group A index of top shares dipped 37.05 points to 2,822.88 and overall central market volume was just 3.315 million litas.
Blue chip falls included Birzai Milk, which ended lower at 10 litas after 11 litas last week on business of 65,750 litas.
Lithuanian Gas also nudged lower to 2.30 litas from 2.39 litas on turnover of 233,567 litas while Hermis Bank dipped to 234.90 litas from 240 litas on trade of 333,558 litas.
Bloc trades worth 2.35 million litas were carried out while low yields kept a lid on the secondary T-bill market where just 32,487 litas of paper changed hands.
